Centuro
Business
Hub

WHY

JOIN US?

If youâre looking to accelerate the growth of your business, meet an exclusive business group and get access to top level investors, join the Centuro Business Hub now! Packed full of benefits, this is the best way to take your business to the next level.

ACCESS TO

FUNDING

Centuro helps connect high growth companies looking for funds with sophisticated investors looking for new opportunities.

As a member of the Business Hub you will be eligible to participate in national pitching competitions in front of investors and the media. The top 3 companies chosen will have the opportunity to attend a global investment summit as part of the Centuro delegation. Here you will be in a pool of 50 companies from around the world with exclusive access to hundreds of highly qualified angel investors.

We are also an official partner of the World Business Angel Investment Forum (WBAF), which is an international organisation aiming to ease access to finance for businesses from start-up to scale-up. Our partnership grants us access to smart finance from leading investors from five continents.

THE

NETWORK

Entrepreneurship and running a business can be a focused pursuit but the value of your support network cannot be emphasised enough. Whatever challenges you face, the chances are there is someone else who has faced something similar. Having access to a network of collaborative, likeminded professionals is therefore invaluable.

Research also suggests that companies spend countless hours looking for advisors be it lawyers, web designers, accountants, or office suppliers. Why spend all this time trawling the internet when you can access a directory of pre-vetted suppliers able to fulfil your every requirement at the most competitive rates.

If you are a service provider, conversely you will have access to a database of potential clients, who are some of the most exciting new companies around the world.

The Centuro Business Hub will be an all encompassing arena for members to conduct business. It will connect the dots to enable all forms of enterprise to take place on one platform. Providing state of the art communication tools connecting all members instantly.

NETWORK

BENEFITS

  • Access to our investors to pitch your product or service quarterly.
  • Access to thoroughly vetted and approved suppliers around the world.

  • NETWORK

    BENEFITS

  • Access to a repository of documents including legal/HR/business plans/policies
  • Media exposure including exclusive access to our prominent renowned media partners & publications around the world.
  • Promotion through monthly newsletters to other members.
  • Access to key events and conferences.
  • Access to workshops and seminars
  • Prearranged peer to peer networking.
  • Invitations to exclusive member retreats and away days.
  • Monthly dinners for selected groups
